pageTitle: Juicy Couture Sleep Essential Shorts | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Inseam: 1.75in / 4.5cm Rise: 9.5in / 24cm MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Wash cold. 93% modal/7% elastane. Fabric: Soft jersey. Woven ribbons and a scalloped lace waistband give a girly edge to these jersey Juicy Couture sleep shorts. Side slits and subtly curved hem. Description Lingerie / Sleepwear > Clothing > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Launched in 1997, Juicy Couture embraces the bright and glamorous fun of its Los Angeles heritage by discovering the couture in the everyday. Famous for ascending the tracksuit to its status as a casual luxury icon, the brand continues to evolve, bringing the same confident, whimsical, and feminine attitude to everything it creates. Today, Juicy Couture offers an assortment of fashion apparel, handbags, shoes, intimates, swimwear, fragrance, accessories, jewelry, and sunglasses. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all Shopbop products.
